SEARCH

Class SecurityGuard

java.lang.Object
Character
SecurityGuard
public class SecurityGuard extends Character
The SecurityGuard class is a subclass of the Character class, it represents a character that can not only attack but can also boost their weapon for to deal additional damage. It has inherited all the instance variables and methods found in the Character superclass, but it has it's own new method that is used to boost the weapon.
Since:
2024-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Palden Tamang

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    boostWeapon(SuperGun w1)
    This method is used to boost the SuperGun weapon held by the security guard It calls the boost method of the SuperGun w1 This sets the Boosted instance variable of the SuperGun w1 to be true, and the SuperGun is now boosted.

    attack, getEnergyLevel, getName, getSkillLevel, hurt, isLose

  • Method Details

    • boostWeapon

      public void boostWeapon(SuperGun w1)
      This method is used to boost the SuperGun weapon held by the security guard It calls the boost method of the SuperGun w1 This sets the Boosted instance variable of the SuperGun w1 to be true, and the SuperGun is now boosted.
      Parameters:
      w1 - This represents the SuperGun weapon that is going to be boosted
